set.entry: This module allows you to display some news - <font color="#666666">title, body and image</font> - for some event and group them by years or months. With a few adaptaptions on the text (ALL edited inside the respective XML file) you may use this module to display any other type of information you find necessary. The long text module allows you to use HTML formatted text on an unlimited scrolling area. This means that you can <font color="#666666">format font, place some images, links, whatever...</font> This module may duplicated the number of times you might need on your website. The services module is a <font color="#666666">single level multicategory gallery with single description for each entry</font>. No need to say that it can be used to present all sorts of info (services, news, events, team members, etc...). All content is XML driven.Morbi ac nisl vel orci posuere faucibus. The projects module is a two level multicategory gallery with multiple description info for each entry. It will allow you to display multiple items for each menu item on top menu.
